title: Penguin Great Ideas
content:
Do you know the name of this font or something that similar, thank you very much.

comments.content: Don’t know what it is, but Jigsaw or Agenda are kinda close.
No, Paul. It’s rather in the Johnston department.
Everything looks right except for that damn R.
